name: Super Driver (itch)
description:
Mini-game inspired by the Wario Ware boss stages, with an old-school comic book style.

Made by Alexandre Villiers-Moriamé and Nicolas Ceriani.

Enjoy!

We encountered a bug on the WebGL build where fullscreen results in a low framerate on some computers, not sure what it is due to. Will try to investigate on that if other players have the same problem!
